pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Normal/Exponential Power Distribution // Functions for obtaining generalized normal/exponential power distribution probabilities, quantiles, densities and random deviates. The generalized normal/exponential power distribution was introduced by Subbotin (1923) and rediscovered by Nadarajah (2005). The parametrization given by Nadarajah (2005) doi:10.1080/02664760500079464 is used.
